column3: Total No. of Cases for Investigation Including Pending Cases from previous year (Col.3)
column5: No. of Cases in which Investigation Refused (Col.5)
column6: No. of Cases in which Investigation Completed - Charge Found False / Mistake of Fact or Law Etc. (Col.6)
column7: No. of Cases in which Investigation Completed - Final Report True Submitted (Col.7)
column8: No. of Cases in which Investigation Completed - Charge Sheets Submitted (Col.8)
column9: No. of Cases in which Investigation Completed - Total (Col.9) = Col.{(6) + (7) + (8)}
column10: No. of Cases Pending Investigation at the end of the year (Col.10)
column12: Percentage of Pendency To All India Total (Col.12)
